get.summary: Returns current price for a symbol on a trading account
get.description: Returns current price for a symbol on a trading account. Requires access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getSymbolPrice method which is included into reader role. Requires access to account resource.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

parameters.name: keepSubscription
parameters.description: if set to true, the account will get a long-term subscription to symbol market data. Long-term subscription means that on subsequent calls you will get updated value faster.If set to false or not set, the subscription will be set to expire in 12 minutes.

200.description: Current price returned successfully

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getSymbolPrice method.

404.description: MetaTrader account not found or not provisioned yet or symbol is not defined for this broker

get.summary: Returns current candle for a symbol and timeframe on a trading account
get.description: Returns current candle for a symbol and timeframe on a trading account. Requires access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getCandle method which is included into reader role. Requires access to account resource.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: defines the timeframe according to which the candle must be generated. Allowed values for MT5 are 1m, 2m, 3m, 4m, 5m, 6m, 10m, 12m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 1d, 1w, 1mn. Allowed values for MT4 are 1m, 5m, 15m 30m, 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w, 1mn

parameters.name: keepSubscription
parameters.description: if set to true, the account will get a long-term subscription to symbol market data. Long-term subscription means that on subsequent calls you will get updated value faster.If set to false or not set, the subscription will be set to expire in 12 minutes.

200.description: Current candle returned successfully

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getCandle method.

404.description: MetaTrader account not found or not provisioned yet or symbol is not defined for this broker

get.summary: Returns current tick for a symbol on a trading account

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

parameters.name: keepSubscription
parameters.description: if set to true, the account will get a long-term subscription to symbol market data. Long-term subscription means that on subsequent calls you will get updated value faster.If set to false or not set, the subscription will be set to expire in 12 minutes.

200.description: Current tick returned successfully

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getTick method.

404.description: MetaTrader account not found or not provisioned yet or symbol is not defined for this broker

parameters.name: keepSubscription

200.description: Current order book returned successfully

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:public:real-time-market-data:getBook method.

get.summary: Returns a list of ID of active users
get.description: Returns a list of ID of users which have last activity field at least one of their accounts later than specified number of days from now (i.e. last activity > now - specified number of days). Requires lastActivity.read permission. Requires access to metaapi-api:rest:private:default:getActiveUserIds method.

parameters.name: lastActivityDays
parameters.description: Number of days from now. Default value is 30

200.description: Array of ID of active users returned successfully

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:private:default:getActiveUserIds method.

put.summary: Sets last activity date for account. For tests only.
put.description: Sets last activity date for account. Requires account.test permission. For tests only. Requires access to metaapi-api:rest:private:default:setLastActivity method. Requires access to account resource.

200.description: Last activity field was successfully changed

403.description: Authorization token has no access to metaapi-api:rest:private:default:setLastActivity method.

get.summary: Executes health checks
get.description: Executes health checks

200.description: health checks passed

marginLevel.description: margin level calculated as % of equity/margin

tradeAllowed.description: flag indicating that trading is allowed

investorMode.description: flag indicating that investor password was used (supported for g2 only)

credit.description: Account credit in the deposit currency

accountCurrencyExchangeRate.description: current exchange rate of account currency into USD

magic.description: position magic number, identifies the EA which opened the position

time.description: time position was opened at, in ISO format

brokerTime.description: time position was opened at, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

updateTime.description: last position modification time, in ISO format

swap.description: position cumulative swap, including both swap from currently open position part (unrealized swap) and swap from partially closed position part (realized swap)

unrealizedSwap.description: swap resulting from currently open position part

realizedSwap.description: swap from partially closed position part

profit.description: position cumulative profit, including unrealized profit resulting from currently open position part (except swap and commissions) and realized profit resulting from partially closed position part and including swap and commissions

unrealizedProfit.description: profit of the part of the position which is not yet closed, excluding swap and commissions

realizedProfit.description: profit of the already closed part, including commissions and swap (realized and unrealized)

commission.description: total position commissions, resulting both from currently open and closed position parts

realizedCommission.description: position realized commission, resulting from partially closed position part

unrealizedCommission.description: position unrealized commission, resulting from currently open position part

clientId.description: optional client-assigned position id. For more information see https://metaapi.cloud/docs/client/clientIdUsage/

accountCurrencyExchangeRate.description: current exchange rate of account currency into USD

brokerComment.description: optional, current comment value on broker side (possibly overriden by the broker)

magic.description: order magic number, identifies the EA which created the order

time.description: time order was created at, in ISO format

brokerTime.description: time order was created at, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

doneTime.description: optional time order was executed or canceled at, in ISO format. Will be specified for completed orders only

doneBrokerTime.description: optional time order was executed or canceled at, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format. Will be specified for completed orders only

openPrice.description: order open price (market price for market orders, limit price for limit orders or stop price for stop orders)

stopLimitPrice.description: the Limit order price for the StopLimit order

currentPrice.description: current price. Filled for pending orders only. Not filled for history orders.

currentVolume.description: order remaining quantity, i.e. requested quantity - filled quantity

positionId.description: order position id. Present only if the order has a position attached to it

brokerComment.description: optional, current comment value on broker side (possibly overriden by the broker)

clientId.description: optional client-assigned order id. For more information see https://metaapi.cloud/docs/client/clientIdUsage/

accountCurrencyExchangeRate.description: current exchange rate of account currency into USD

closeByPositionId.description: identifier of an opposite position used for closing by order ORDER_TYPE_CLOSE_BY

magic.description: optional deal magic number, identifies the EA which initiated the deal

time.description: time the deal was conducted at, in ISO format

brokerTime.description: time the deal was conducted at, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

price.description: optional, the price the deal was conducted at

positionId.description: optional id of position the deal relates to

orderId.description: optional id of order the deal relates to

brokerComment.description: optional, current deal comment value on broker side (possibly overriden by the broker)

clientId.description: optional client-assigned deal id. For more information see https://metaapi.cloud/docs/client/clientIdUsage/

accountCurrencyExchangeRate.description: current exchange rate of account currency into USD

stopLoss.description: deal stop loss. For MT5 opening deal this is the SL of the order opening the position. For MT4 deals or MT5 closing deal this is the last known position SL.

takeProfit.description: deal take profit. For MT5 opening deal this is the TP of the order opening the position. For MT4 deals or MT5 closing deal this is the last known position TP.

openPrice.description: optional order limit or stop price

stopLimitPrice.description: optional price at which the StopLimit order will be placed. Required for stop limit orders

stopLossUnits.description: stop loss units. ABSOLUTE_PRICE means the that the value of stopLoss field is a final stop loss value. RELATIVE_* means that the stopLoss field value contains relative stop loss expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is ABSOLUTE_PRICE

takeProfitUnits.description: take profit units. ABSOLUTE_PRICE means the that the value of takeProfit field is a final take profit value. RELATIVE_* means that the takeProfit field value contains relative take profit expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is ABSOLUTE_PRICE

stopPriceBase.description: defined the base price to calculate SL/TP relative to for *_MODIFY and pending order requests. STOP_PRICE means the SL/TP is relative to previous SL/TP value. Default is OPEN_PRICE.

openPriceUnits.description: open price units. ABSOLUTE_PRICE means the that the value of openPrice field is a final open price value. RELATIVE_* means that the openPrice field value contains relative open price expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is ABSOLUTE_PRICE

openPriceBase.description: defined the base price to calculate open price relative to for ORDER_MODIFY and pending order requests. Default is CURRENT_PRICE for pending orders or STOP_LIMIT_PRICE for stop limit orders.

stopLimitPriceUnits.description: stop limit price units. ABSOLUTE_PRICE means the that the value of stopLimitPrice field is a final stop limit price value. RELATIVE_* means that the stopLimitPrice field value contains relative stop limit price expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is ABSOLUTE_PRICE

stopLimitPriceBase.description: defined the base price to calculate stop limit price relative to for ORDER_MODIFY requests.

orderId.description: optional order id, must be specified for order modification commands

positionId.description: optional position id, must be specified for position modification commands

closeByPositionId.description: identifier of an opposite position used for closing by order, required in case actionType is POSITION_CLOSE_BY

clientId.description: optional client-assigned order id. For more information see https://metaapi.cloud/docs/client/clientIdUsage/

slippage.description: slippage in points. Should be greater or equal to zero. In not set, default value specified in account entity will be used. Slippage is ignored on position modification, order modification and order cancellation calls. Slippage is also ignored if execution mode set in symbol specification is SYMBOL_TRADE_EXECUTION_MARKET

fillingModes.description: allowed filling modes in the order of priority. Default is to allow all filling modes and prefer ORDER_FILLING_FOK over ORDER_FILLING_IOC. See https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/tradingconstants/orderproperties#enum_order_type_filling for extra explanation

type.description: pending order expiration type. See https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/tradingconstants/orderproperties#enum_order_type_time for the list of possible options. MetaTrader4 platform supports only ORDER_TIME_SPECIFIED expiration type

time.description: pending order expiration time. Ignored if expiration type is not one of ORDER_TIME_DAY or ORDER_TIME_SPECIFIED

distance.description: distance trailing stop loss configuration. If both distance and threshold TSL are set, then the resulting SL will be the one which is closest to the current price

threshold.description: threshold trailing stop loss configuration. If both distance and threshold TSL are set, then the resulting SL will be the one which is closest to the current price

distance.description: SL distance relative to current price, interpreted according to units field value

units.description: distance trailing stop loss units. RELATIVE_* means that the distance field value contains relative stop loss expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is RELATIVE_PRICE

threshold stop loss units. ABSOLUTE_PRICE means the that the value of stop loss threshold fields contain a final threshold & stop loss value. RELATIVE_* means that the threshold fields value contains relative threshold & stop loss values, expressed either in price, points, pips, account currency or balance percentage. Default is ABSOLUTE_PRICE

stopPriceBase.description: defined the base price to calculate SL relative to for POSITION_MODIFY requests. Default is OPEN_PRICE.

StopLossThreshold.description: configuration of a single threshold stop loss

threshold.description: price threshold relative to position open price, interpreted according to units field value

stopLoss.description: stop loss value, interpreted according to units and basePrice field values

numericCode.description: numeric response code, see https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/errorswarnings/enum_trade_return_codes and https://book.mql4.com/appendix/errors. Response codes which indicate success are 0, 10008-10010, 10025. The rest codes are errors.

stringCode.description: string response code, see https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/errorswarnings/enum_trade_return_codes and https://book.mql4.com/appendix/errors. Response codes which indicate success are ERR_NO_ERROR, TRADE_RETCODE_PLACED, TRADE_RETCODE_DONE, TRADE_RETCODE_DONE_PARTIAL, TRADE_RETCODE_NO_CHANGES. The rest codes are errors.

orderId.description: optional, id of the order created or modified by the trade

positionId.description: optional, id of the position created or modified by the trade

symbol.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

minVolume.description: minimum order volume for the symbol

maxVolume.description: maximum order volume for the symbol

volumeStep.description: order volume step for the symbol

fillingModes.description: list of allowed order filling modes. See https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/tradingconstants/orderproperties#enum_order_type_filling for extra explanation.

quoteSessions.description: quote sessions, indexed by day of week

tradeSessions.description: trade sessions, indexed by day of week

bondAccruedInterest.description: accrued interest  accumulated coupon interest, i.e. part of the coupon interest calculated in proportion to the number of days since the coupon bond issuance or the last coupon interest payment

bondFaceValue.description: face value  initial bond value set by the issuer

optionStrike.description: the strike price of an option. The price at which an option buyer can buy (in a Call option) or sell (in a Put option) the underlying asset, and the option seller is obliged to sell or buy the appropriate amount of the underlying asset.

optionPriceSensivity.description: option/warrant sensitivity shows by how many points the price of the option's underlying asset should change so that the price of the option changes by one point

liquidityRate.description: liquidity Rate is the share of the asset that can be used for the margin

initialMargin.description: initial margin means the amount in the margin currency required for opening a position with the volume of one lot. It is used for checking a client's assets when he or she enters the market

maintenanceMargin.description: the maintenance margin. If it is set, it sets the margin amount in the margin currency of the symbol, charged from one lot. It is used for checking a client's assets when his/her account state changes. If the maintenance margin is equal to 0, the initial margin is used

hedgedMargin.description: contract size or margin value per one lot of hedged positions (oppositely directed positions of one symbol). Two margin calculation methods are possible for hedged positions. The calculation method is defined by the broker

hedgedMarginUsesLargerLeg.description: calculating hedging margin using the larger leg (Buy or Sell)

swapRollover3Days.description: day of week to charge 3 days swap rollover

orderGTCMode.description: if the expirationMode property is set to SYMBOL_EXPIRATION_GTC (good till canceled), the expiration of pending orders, as well as of Stop Loss/Take Profit orders should be additionally set using this enumeration. See https://www.mql5.com/en/docs/constants/environment_state/marketinfoconstants#enum_symbol_order_gtc_mode

startTime.description: date of the symbol trade beginning (usually used for futures)

expirationTime.description: date of the symbol trade end (usually used for futures)

pipSize.description: size of a pip. Pip size is defined for spot and CFD symbols only

stopsLevel.description: minimal indention in points from the current close price to place Stop orders

freezeLevel.description: distance to freeze trade operations in points

from.description: session start time, in hh.mm.ss.SSS format

to.description: session end time, in hh.mm.ss.SSS format

symbol.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

profitTickValue.description: tick value for a profitable position

lossTickValue.description: tick value for a loosing position

accountCurrencyExchangeRate.description: current exchange rate of account currency into USD

brokerTime.description: quote time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

symbol.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

timeframe.description: timeframe candle was generated for, e.g. 1h

brokerTime.description: candle opening time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

tickVolume.description: tick volume, i.e. number of ticks inside the candle

symbol.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

brokerTime.description: time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

volume.description: volume for the current last deal price

side.description: is tick a result of buy or sell deal

symbol.description: symbol (e.g. currency pair or an index)

brokerTime.description: time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

perUser.description: The number of credits used from credits available to all deployed accounts

perAccount.description: The number of credits used from credits available for one account

perServer.description: The number of credits used from credits available on this server

available.description: the number of available credits for the period

total.description: total number of credits for the period

synchronized.description: flag indicating if synchronization have completed

g1.description: Ignored fields for hash calculation for G1 accounts

g2.description: Ignored fields for hash calculation for G2 accounts

HashingIgnoredFields.description: Ignored fields for SDK hash calculation

specification.description: Specification fields not included into hash calculation

position.description: Position fields not included into hash calculation

order.description: Order fields not included into hash calculation

brokerTime.description: current broker time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

lastQuoteTime.description: last quote time, in ISO format

lastQuoteBrokerTime.description: last quote time, in broker timezone, YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS format

volume.description: order volume, must be greater than 0

openPrice.description: order open price, must be greater than 0

Margin.description: Margin required to open a trade

margin.description: margin required to open a trade. If margin can not be calculated, then this field is not defined

arguments.description: Error message arguments, used for i18n

requestsPerPeriodAllowed.description: allowed number of requests per period
